messages.subject: Re: Kate in CA
messages.msgSnippet: ... Yes, what the other Pam said. If she s north rather than south I Win, Pam S.  Pam H., participant in a fun little unschooling group in the San Joaquin
messages.messageBody:
----------
>From: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 3038
>Date: Fri, Feb 14, 2003, 8:55 PM
>

> So thank you to everyone who continues to put up with inflexible people
> (including me, even though I do it quietly at home and not on the
> list). Keep up the good work, I know I need and value it.
>
> Kate in Ca
> who is trying her best to be a better unschooling parent everyday


Yes, what the other Pam said. If she's north rather than south I Win, Pam S.
<g>

Pam H., participant in a fun little unschooling group in the San Joaquin
Valley
